name: Buggin' Arround
description:
Game developed by me, myself and i for Wowie Jam 2.0 in Godot Game Engine

Jam Theme: Intencional Bugs

All assets made by me except Audio and Fonts

 ### ABOUT ###

You are a bug trying to intecionally bug other people by hitting their faces, hit as many faces you can and try not to leave anyone behind, take care with peoples body or they'll slap you or step you.

#### CONTROLS ####

SPACE BAR: HOLD TO FLY RELEASE TO FALL

UP ARROW: CHANGE TO A FURTHER LAYER

DOWN ARROW: CHANGE TO A CLOSER LAYER

PS.: You need to be in the same layer as the person to hit it

Leave a comment :) tell me if you liked it or if it sucks,

 was really tough to develop this in 72 hours... 

know some tips? teach me! :D
